channel.title: The Boy Who Called Virus
channel.description: There once was a nooblet who was bored as he sat on Moparscape posting hundreds of usless help threads. To amuse himself he moved his fingers and typed out, "Virus! Virus! Theres a virus in this server!" The moparians came reading up on the thread to help the nooblet protect the others from getting infected. But when they downloaded the servers and ran a virus scan, there was none. The nooblet laughed at the sight of their angry posts. "Don't cry 'virus', faggot," said the villagers, "when there's no virus!" They went grumbling back down into eclipse. Later, the boy sang out again, "Virus! Virus! The viruse has infected my computer!" To his naughty delight, he watched the moparians post on the thread to help the nooblet protect the others from getting infected. When the villagers saw no virus they sternly said, "Save your posts for when there is really something wrong! Don't cry 'virus' when there is NO virus, bitch!" But the boy just grinned and watched them go grumbling down into eclipse once more. Later, he saw a REAL virus leading him to infected porn sites. Alarmed, he leaped on moparscape and posted a hundred times, "Virus! Virus!" But the moparians thought he was trying to fool them again, and so they didn't come. At sunset, everyone had downloaded and ran the virus infected server. Later on they started seeing porn all over their screens. "There really was a virus in the server! Were all screwed! I typed out, "Virus!" Why didn't you listen?" Nobody gave a fuck about the nooblet and we wondered how to remove the virus. "We'll ban you in the morning," he said, as Davidi2 was about to ban him, "Nobody likes a faggot, even when he is right!"

item.title: The Boy Who Called Virus
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“llcoolchris, post:13, topic:459674”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=562582.msg4102120#msg4102120 date=1347618569]

I take it tyb97 is one of the ones who try to put a virus in a server, and don’t want people to be cautious. Yeah some files make a virus scan pop up saying “this program seems like a threat” but there is some server that actually have key-loggers and any or most scanners will say key-logger or virus when it is something truly bad.

there is nothing wrong with being safe.

Yeah but somebody calling virus on a server when there isn’t one, even if it is for caution, nobody will download that server. If you’re gonna call it, provide proof.
[/quote]

Person can easily use hotspot shield and internet explorer (latest version). and those two programs will delete the “bad things” before you can even click “run” or even see the file/folder. so, if there is no proof and someone wants to risk it, there is programs to protect. and who cares if someone decided not to download a server. I take it noone wanted to download one of your servers? I see people all the time saying virus bu ti still give it a go, and half the time nothing happens and it runs okay but the other half hotspot shield or ie delete it from my computer.[/quote]
One problem with your argument, I’ve never released a server. This little poem was for my own amusment, and anyone else who found it funny. It’s a shame we live in a world today where some people have no sense of humor what-so-ever.

Read full topic
